text: Gyan Chand Jain (1923-2007) was an Indian writer and scholar of Urdu literature. Born in 1923 at Seohara of Bijnore district in the Indian state of Uttar Pradesh, Jain was known for his scholarship on Ghalib literature. == References == == Other Website == * * Category:1923 births Category:2007 deaths Category:20th-century Indian poets Category:People from Uttar Pradesh
title: Gyan Chand Jain
